#summary jobPage
#labels free,cms,freecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统
= jobPage=

<p>
<span style="font-style:italic;font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;">从FreeCMS 1.5 开始支持</span><span style="font-style:italic;font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;"></span> 
</p>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">根据参数提取职位分页列表。</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span>

</td>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;">说明</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;"></span>

<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">num</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>

<p>

</p>

<tr>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">id</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span>

<p>

<p>

</p>

<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">1.</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">添加</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">时间降序(默认)</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>

<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">2.</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">添加</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">时间升序</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>

<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;">示例1</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
{{{
　　<@jobPage  num='1' page='${page!1}' siteid='${site.id}' action='${contextPath}templet_pro.do?siteid=${site.id}&currChannelid=${currChannel.id}&templetPath=job/jobPage.html';jobList,pager>
　　
　　<ul>
　　	<#list jobList as job>
　　	<li>
　　		<a href="${contextPath}templet_pro.do?siteid=${site.id}&currChannelid=${currChannel.id}&templetPath=job/job.html&jobid=${job.id}">${job.name}</a>
　　	</li>
　　	</#list>
　　</ul>
　　${pager.formPageStr}
</@jobPage>
}}}
